texto: are: • the introduction of normative subcharacteristics, most of which are based on the informative subcharacteristics in ISO/IEC 9126 (1991); • the specification of a quality model; • the introduction of quality in use; • removal of the evaluation process (which is now specified in the ISO/IEC 14598 standards); • co-ordination of the content with ISO/IEC 14598-1.
